item.title: ABX Express Tracking Application
item.description:
ABX Express Tracking Application

“ABX Express Tracking Application” is a simple application that you can use to check your parcel delivery status. It has a simple interface and is very easy to use.

To check your ABX Express parcel status directly from our main site, please click this link ABX Express Tracking.

ABX Express Tracking For Facebook Tab

This application is also available to be install to your facebook fanpage. To install this application to your fanpage, please click the button below.

Install To FB Fanpage

Screenshoot

Desktop View

Result Page View

Mobile View

Changelog

Version 1.0

. Application launch.

FAQ

Do I need to pay to install the application?

No. The application is available to you for free of charge. There is no need to pay. The application is a token from us to you because you have spend your time visiting our website.

Can I ask you to custom made the application?

Yes. You can ask for a custom made version of the application with us for a small fee. The custom made version allow you to put your own advertisement to you fanpage.
